verses.name: 1 Chronicles 18:11
verses.text: Them also king David dedicated unto the Lord, with the silver and the gold that he brought from all these nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 18:12
verses.text: Moreover Abishai the son of Zeruiah slew of the Edomites in the valley of salt eighteen thousand.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 18:13
verses.text: And he put garrisons in Edom; and all the Edomites became David’s servants. Thus the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 18:14
verses.text: So David reigned over all Israel, and executed judgment and justice among all his people.
